entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few rain showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1100 metres this afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
